column4: hi how can i make my desktop like this   http://www.ubuntux.org/latest-ubuntu
please help
um that's pretty simple
set transparency on your panels and set transparency on your gnome-terminal
find a leet background, and poof you're done
how please?
preferences, use the control panel
settings... look around in your menus, use your brain, you'll figure it out
ok
as for the other items, that thing on the left looks like probably either gkrellms or torsmo
the thing on the right is just a random weather applet, don't know which one
where can i find gdesklets item ?
synaptic
i didn t find any thins in system menu what do i do?
you should keep looking
synaptic is in the ubuntu menu somewhere
it's also in the panel preferences
i didn t find it
for this http://www.ubuntux.org/ubuntu-6-06-gateway-m675-laptop
same thing, make your panels transparent, make your terminal transparent... find that particular background and you're done
http://digitalblasphemy.com/ and http://deviantart.com both will have lots of wallpaper for you to choose from
thank you very much
